name: Social Media Multi-Post
template:
customize :
{SourceFolder} = Droidrun
{Caption} = enter_caption
{Apps} = All Installed Social Media

Goal : Post the latest photo from "{SourceFolder}" to the apps defined in {Apps}.

Smart Logic:
1. File & Content Prep:
   - Navigate to Internal Storage > {SourceFolder}.
   - Sort by "Date Modified" (Newest First) and open the most recent image.
   - Copy {Caption} to the system clipboard.

2. Scope Definition:
   - Check {Apps}. 
   - If {Apps} contains specific names (e.g., "Instagram, X"): Create a "Target List" of only those apps.
   - If {Apps} says "All Installed...": Create a "Target List" by scanning the Share Sheet for ANY app categorized as Social/Chat (Instagram, Facebook, X, LinkedIn, Snapchat, Threads, TikTok, etc.).

3. Execution Loop (Repeat for items in Target List):
   - Tap "Share" icon on the photo.
   - Select the current app from the Target List.
   - Paste {Caption} from clipboard.
   - Tap "Post".
   - Wait for "Posting/Sent" notification.
   - Switch back to Gallery/File Manager immediately to process the next app.

4. Completion: Clear clipboard.
